Phil Spencer is planning how to enter and partner in the handheld device and mobile-store markets

item.title: 亚马逊让残疾员工更难在家工作
item.description:
新的 "多级领导审查 "可能需要数周时间，这引发了人们的担忧，担心受影响的企业员工会放弃并辞职。【原文：

New ‘multilevel leader review’ can take weeks and has prompted concerns that affected corporate workers will give up and quit.

】

item.title: 一月份将成为全球贸易的关键月份
item.description: 当世界上许多国家都在为 1 月 20 日的美国就职日做准备时，这个月还有一个日子给全球经济带来了不确定性。【原文：While much of the world braces for US Inauguration Day on Jan. 20, there’s another date that month that’s heaping uncertainty on the global economy.】

item.title: 大脑植入初创企业旨在让盲人重见光明
item.description:
越来越多的公司认为，他们的技术可以让一些患者重见光明。【原文：

A growing group of companies think their technology can give some patients the ability to see. 

】

item.title: 英国央行行长曼称决策者有能力等待降息
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，货币政策对通胀的影响比经济理论认为的要快，这使得官员们在大幅降息之前可以等待。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said monetary policy is impacting inflation more quickly than economic theory suggests, allowing officials to wait before making big cuts to interest rates.】

item.title: 美国优先 "使其他地方的股票和货币下挫
item.description: 无论是对通货膨胀的担忧，还是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税和减税计划的威胁—；所有这一切都等同于：美国以外的几乎所有市场都面临压力。投资者认为，特朗普的政策将引发通胀，并可能导致美联储在进一步降息时谨慎行事。令人吃惊的是，现在市场对 12 月降息的预期接近 50/50，对 6 月前降息的预期仅为两次，而在上一次降息时，市场对 12 月降息的预期几乎为四次。【原文：Whether you ascribe it to concerns about inflation, or the threat of Donald Trump’s tariffs and tax-cut plans — it all amounts to the same thing: pressure on almost every market outside the US. Investors are saying that Trump's policies will be inflationary and may cause the Fed to err on the side of caution with further interest rate cuts. It's striking that the market is close to 50/50 on a December rate cut now and only looking for two reductions through June, against almost four seen at the】

item.title: 特斯拉 "备忘录 "式的股价飙升让华尔街感到警惕
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全力支持推动了特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s post-election surge, powered by Elon Musk’s full-throated support for Donald Trump, has added almost $250 billion to the carmaker’s value, a staggering sum that now has some on Wall Street urging caution.】

item.title: 吉娃丹美国工厂发生爆炸，造成两人死亡，数人受伤
item.description: 瑞士香精香料生产商 Givaudan SA 说，其位于肯塔基州路易斯维尔的一家生产厂发生爆炸，造成两人死亡，数人受伤。【原文：Swiss flavor and fragrance maker Givaudan SA said that two people were killed and several others were injured after an explosion occurred at one of its production facilities in Louisville, Kentucky.】

item.title: 外资抛售，印度 Nifty 指数进入修正区间
item.description: 印度基准 NSE Nifty 50 指数进入了所谓的调整期，原因是外国投资者的持续抛售和疲软的业绩季导致盈利评级下调。【原文：India’s benchmark NSE Nifty 50 Index entered a so-called correction amid persistent selling by foreign investors and a weak results season that’s led to earnings downgrades.】

item.title: 欧洲期货交易所推迟欧盟债券期货，对集团造成打击
item.description: 欧洲最大的债券期货交易所推迟推出与欧盟债务挂钩的期货合约，这对该集团促进其债券交易的目标是一个打击。【原文：Europe’s largest bond futures exchange has postponed the introduction of a futures contract tied to European Union debt, a blow to the bloc’s aims to boost trading in its bonds.】

item.title: 风险最高的股票处于暴涨水平，显示出特朗普交易的脆弱性
item.description: 周二，市场对股市过热的担忧占据了主导地位，这凸显了当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在大选中取得决定性胜利后，市场高风险部分急剧膨胀的泡沫感。【原文：Worries around overheating stocks took over the narrative on Tuesday, underscoring the sense of froth in risky parts of the market that had surged after President-elect Donald Trump’s decisive election victory.】

item.title: 燃料团体警告称，如果没有税收抵免的确定性，价格将上涨
item.description: 能源、农业和运输行业的 30 多个贸易团体表示，美国政府在税收减免方面缺乏指导，使美国人面临燃油价格上涨的风险。【原文：More than 30 trade groups across the energy, farming and transport sectors say a lack of US government guidance on tax credits is putting Americans at risk of higher fuel prices.】

item.title: 中国在财政政策支持下降低购房税费
item.description: 中国政府正在削减购房税费，试图为不断下跌的房价筑底，并维持住房交易量的增长。【原文：China is cutting taxes for home purchases, as the government tries to put a floor under falling prices and sustain an improvement in housing transactions.】

item.title: 纳格尔警告：特朗普的关税计划可能使德国损失 1%的国内生产总值
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）警告说，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要征收贸易税，这有可能使德国经济脱轨。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel warned that Donald Trump’s threatened trade levies risk derailing the German economy.】

item.title: OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 正在努力打造更先进的人工智能
item.description:
三家领先的人工智能公司在耗费巨资开发新模型的过程中看到的回报越来越少。【原文：

Three of the leading artificial intelligence companies are seeing diminishing returns from their costly efforts to develop newer models.

】

item.title: 史密斯集团发布财报，股价创逾 35 年最大涨幅
item.description: 史密斯集团（Smiths Group Plc）股价周三短暂飙升，创下历史新高，原因是这家拥有 150 多年历史的英国工程公司公布了一份强劲的季度业绩报告，并上调了收入指导，这与该股今年迄今为止的艰难表现形成了鲜明对比。【原文：Shares in Smiths Group Plc briefly surged to a record high on Wednesday as the more than 150-year-old British engineering firm reported a strong quarter and increased its revenue guidance, belying what had until now been a tough year for the stock.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元基金调整战略，加快交易速度
item.description: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元的财富基金正在采用更科学的投资方法，更多地依靠自己的量化团队来加快决策速度，以提高收益。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s $1 trillion wealth fund is embracing a more scientific approach to investing, leaning more on its own quant team to speed up decision-making as it seeks to bolster returns.】

item.title: 赞比亚将关键利率上调至 14%，以降低物价，支撑克瓦查汇率
item.description: 赞比亚央行将关键利率上调至2017年以来的最高水平，以遏制物价压力并支撑其伤痕累累的货币。【原文：Zambia’s central bank raised its key interest rate to the highest level since 2017 to contain price pressures and prop up its bruised currency.】

item.title: 哦，讽刺特朗普的胜利与未来四年
item.description:
民主党人认为这次选举事关身体自主权。对许多选民来说，这更多的是关于鸡蛋的价格。【原文：

Democrats thought the election was about bodily autonomy. For many voters, it was more about the price of eggs.

】

item.title: CVC支持的FineToday将于12月在东京黄金市场上市
item.description: 日本个人护理用品企业 FineToday Holdings Co. 将于 12 月在东京证券交易所主板市场上市，根据指示价格，预计市值为 2,194 亿日元（14 亿美元）。【原文：Japanese personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co. will debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange’s Prime Market in December, with an estimated market value of ¥219.4 billion ($1.4 billion) based on the indicative price.】

item.title: 暑期游戏大卖，腾讯收入增长 8
item.description: 在《地下城与勇士》（Dungeon & Fighter Mobile）于夏季上映后，腾讯控股有限公司的收入增长了 8%，帮助这家中国最有价值的公司抵御了严重的经济衰退。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s revenue rose 8% after the summer release of Dungeon & Fighter Mobile helped China’s most valuable company resist a severe economic downturn.】

item.title: 比马斯克收购 X 还要大的七项收购案；i 的提议将跻身顶级收购交易之列
item.description: Seven & i 控股公司管理层提出的私有化要约价值约 9 万亿日元（580 亿美元），超过了私募股权或管理层参与的最大收购案的价值。【原文：An offer worth around ¥9 trillion ($58 billion) from the management of Seven & i Holdings Co. to take itself private exceeds the value of the biggest buyouts involving private equity or the management.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司总裁伊扎姆续约后将继续留任
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）周三证实，该公司首席执行官伊扎姆-伊斯梅尔（Izham Ismail）在续约后将继续执掌公司一年。【原文：Malaysia Airlines Chief Executive Officer Izham Ismail will stay at the helm another year after his contract was extended, the carrier confirmed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据说 Bumi Armada 正在考虑收购 MISC 近海能源资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚大亨 T. Ananda Krishnan 控制的油田服务提供商 Bumi Armada Bhd 正在考虑收购 MISC Bhd 的海上能源业务。【原文：Bumi Armada Bhd., an oil field services provider controlled by Malaysian tycoon T. Ananda Krishnan, is considering buying MISC Bhd.’s offshore energy business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 冲突持续，黎巴嫩动用美元储备支撑受创货币
item.description: 黎巴嫩的外汇储备在一年多的时间里首次下降，因为央行在几周的战争后花费美元支撑英镑。【原文：Lebanon’s foreign-exchange reserves dropped for the first time in more than a year as the central bank spent dollars to prop up the pound after weeks of war.】

item.title: 希腊总理称特朗普获胜后欧洲需要更强的自治能力
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普连任后，欧洲需要加强自主性并提高竞争力。【原文：Europe needs to strengthen its autonomy and improve its competitiveness following the reelection of Donald Trump, Greece’s Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said.】

item.title: 五年清洁支出计划已过半，上交所总裁将退休
item.description: 上交所（SSE Plc）首席执行官阿利斯泰尔-菲利普斯-戴维斯（Alistair Phillips-Davies）将于明年退休，因为该公司为期五年、总值 205 亿英镑（约合 261 亿美元）的绿色投资计划已经过半。【原文：SSE Plc’s chief executive officer Alistair Phillips-Davies is set to retire next year as the company reaches the halfway point in its five-year £20.5 billion ($26.1 billion) green investment plan.】
